## ðŸŽ¨ Design & Code
* **Design:** Created high-fidelity mockups in **Figma** before coding.
* **Frontend:** Built using HTML5, tailwind CSS.
* **Backend:** Built using Java Script.

## ðŸš€ Features
* Easy to access and use site.
* Has forms to make contacting the company easier.
* Good white spaces use and just a modern simple design and good looking at the same time.
* Suitable as a template for multiple use only by changing colors and data in it.
